## Constant Maturity Treasury Yield Curve

```{r echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
library(magrittr)
library(plotly)

tsy <- readxl::read_xls(paste0(getwd(),"/data/ACMTermPremium.xls"), sheet = 'ACM Daily') %>%
  data.table::as.data.table() %>%
  mutate(DATE = as.Date(DATE, format = "%d-%B-%Y"))

p <- plot_ly(tsy, x = ~DATE, y = ~ACMY02, name = '2Y', type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines') %>%
  add_trace(y = ~ACMY10, name = '10Y', mode = 'lines') %>%
  layout(title = 'Constant Maturity US Treasury Yield',
         yaxis = list(zeroline = TRUE, title = "Yield in %"),
         xaxis = list(zeroline = FALSE))

p
```
